item.title: Colorado company releases wine for cats
item.description:
Colorado company releases wine for cats

DENVER, June 17 (UPI) -- A Colorado company is looking to help cat owners enjoy the experience of sharing a glass of wine with their pets. The non-alcoholic, beet-based cat wine was developed specifically for cats by Denver-based Apollo Peak. Cats can enjoy the company's products in two varieties, including the red "Pinot Meow" and white "Moscato."
